messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

urgent re oracle error when posting friday urgent re error posting hi again same error date selected header level also level invoice validated tries post october even opened date entered happens randomly posted without issues going next period even same period entered date entered by idea please priority affecting processing close thank kind regards accountant ext error posting importance high hi please posting date has selected invoice posted today date flows think incorrect invoice period which selected date please priority thanks kind regards accountant ext information
